      • getAllPeople

        public java.util.Vector<Person> getAllPeople​()
                                      throws fr.webservicecore.error.APIException
        Get the list of the people
        Returns:
        An array of all People objects
        Throws:
        fr.webservicecore.error.APIException - Exception containing the error message coming from the People service

        public Person getOnePersonById​(java.lang.String id)
                        throws fr.webservicecore.error.APIException

        Parameters:
        id - Identification number of the person
        Returns:
        The People object whose its id is the one requested
        Throws:

      • createPerson

        public Person createPerson​(java.lang.String login,
                           java.lang.String lastname,
                           java.lang.String firstname,
                           java.lang.String sex,
                           java.util.Date birthdate,
                           boolean major,
                           java.lang.String mail,
                           java.lang.String tel,
                           java.lang.String picture,
                           java.lang.String creator)
                    throws fr.webservicecore.error.APIException
        Create one person on the Node JS server
        Parameters:
        login - Login of the person
        lastname - Lastname of the person
        firstname - Firstname of the person
        sex - Sex of the person
        birthdate - Birthdate of the person
        major - Flag to define if the person is aged 18 or more
        mail - Mail of the person
        tel - Phone number of the person
        picture - Picture path of the person
        creator - Creator user which created the person
        Returns:
        The People object created
        Throws:
        fr.webservicecore.error.APIException - Exception containing the error message coming from the People service

      • updatePerson

        public Person updatePerson​(java.lang.String id,
                           java.lang.String login,
                           java.lang.String lastname,
                           java.lang.String firstname,
                           java.lang.String sex,
                           java.util.Date birthdate,
                           boolean major,
                           java.lang.String mail,
                           java.lang.String tel,
                           java.lang.String picture,
                           java.lang.String updator)
                    throws fr.webservicecore.error.APIException
        Update one person on the Node JS server
        Parameters:
        id - Identification number of the person
        login - Login of the person
        lastname - Lastname of the person
        firstname - Firstname of the person
        sex - Sex of the person
        birthdate - Birthdate of the person
        major - Flag to define if the person is aged 18 or more
        mail - Mail of the person
        tel - Phone number of the person
        picture - Picture path of the person
        updator - Updator user which updated the person
        Returns:
        The People object after the update
        Throws:
        fr.webservicecore.error.APIException - Exception containing the error message coming from the People service

                             java.lang.String updator)
                      throws fr.webservicecore.error.APIException
        Associate a tag to one person
        Parameters:
        id - Identification number of the person
        tag - Tag to add in the tag list of the person
        updator - Updator user which updated the person
        Returns:
        The People object after the update
        Throws:
        fr.webservicecore.error.APIException - Exception containing the error message coming from the People service

        protected Person accessAuxiOne​(fr.webservicecore.network.HttpMethod method,

                               java.util.List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> urlParameters)
                        throws fr.webservicecore.error.APIException
        Get one people
        Parameters:
        method - The HTTP method chosen to interact with the server
        http_address - The URL address of the People service (used for all HTTP method)
        urlParameters - The list of parameters to send (used for POST and PUT HTTP methods)
        Returns:
        One People object
        Throws:
        fr.webservicecore.error.APIException - Exception containing the error message coming from the People service
